snippet: The boat was carrying more than 100 Syrians, Iraqis and Palestinians who were apparently trying to migrate to the European Union, the semiofficial Anatolian News Agency said.
abstract: At least 58 migrants drown in the Aegean Sea just off the Turkish coast after the fishing boat that was carrying them sank; boat was carrying more than 100 Syrians, Iraqis and Palestinians who were apparently trying to migrate to the European Union.
lead_paragraph: The boat was carrying more than 100 Syrians, Iraqis and Palestinians who were apparently trying to migrate to the European Union, the semiofficial Anatolian News Agency said.

headline.seo: Scores of Migrants Die After Boat Sinks Off Turkey
headline.main: Migrants Die as Boat Sinks Off Turkey
headline.print_headline: Migrants Die as Boat Sinks Off Turkey
